title: Reverse engineering apps for Windows Phone 7 and 8
content:
How can I reverse engineer Windows Phone apps? Especially apps that are running on version 7.8 and 8 of the OS?

I'm looking for tools and procedures for doing this.

answers_data.content:
If you have the XAP file, it is just a ZIP format. You can rename it and open it.

If you don't have the XAP file, you can use XGENO to get it - http://mktwp7.codeplex.com/

To decompile the DLLs, use DotPeek.
